section.p: During real-time communication, the Agora SDK enables the default video input device, that is, the built-in camera to capture video. If you need a custom video source, implement the class first, and call this method to add the custom video source to the SDK.
section.note: You can call this method either before or after joining a channel.

plentry.pd: A custom video source. For details, see .

ul.li: : The custom video source is added to the SDK.
: The custom video source is not added to the SDK.
